system.description:
Your ferocity and personal magnetism have fused into a whole as inspiring to your allies as it is unnerving to your enemies. You gain the following benefits:

  • While you are raging, your berserker levels count as marshal levels for the purposes of the Extra Attack feature.

  • You gain a second option from the Warrior Born feature.

  • Friendly creatures within the range of your Commanding Presence feature gain the benefits of your Danger Sense feature as long as you are conscious and not incapacitated.
